channel.title: Game spots "Greatest Villain" poll
channel.description:
Game spot's having a poll as to who's the greatest video game villain of all time, thought I'd bring this to the fore front on the community.
Vote for Breen or what ever, don't give a shit. Round 1A is going on B will start on 30th of Aug.
[url='https://www.gamespot.com/greatest-video-game-villain/vote/battle-hub/index.html']This is where you vote.[/url]

item.title: Game spots "Greatest Villain" poll
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

Half Life fanboys suck (yeah suckers I said that, dare a fucking stand against me).
Seriously, REVOLVER FUCKING OCELOT losing to some generic lame-ass puppet administrator?
I knew that gamespot sucked, but…

EDIT: Oh wait… nevermind, it’s still up.

All fanboys suck but almost no one who enjoys video games a lot can be able to not call them self a fanboy.

item.title: Game spots "Greatest Villain" poll
item.dc:creator: James.Curse
item.description:
Well I think we should all vote for Dr.Breen. Lets make it in memory of the deceased Robert Culp. He provided a character that, instead of becoming a stereotypical James Bond villain became a deep character with the one one could relate. He just felt real. Ok, he was with the bad guys but one could see through his intentions which were noble but… misguided.

So I say, GO Dr.Breen!! (lets see how far glaDOS gets)

Read full topic

item.title: Game spots "Greatest Villain" poll
item.dc:creator: MaxTheLimit
item.description:
I’m calling a Ganondorf versus Bowser in top bracket, and in bottom bracket I’m saying Breen versus Diablo.
Top bracket goes to Bowser, bottom to Breen. Breen wins.

I selected Gannondorf/Bowser because of the strength of the nintentdo fanboy base, and picked Bowser to win because of the stronger Mario fanbase.

Diablo was picked because of the Blizzard ball suckers, and Breen because of the competition he has on his bracket and the strength of Valve fanboys. GlaDOS may have made it but I’m not sure she would get past Diablo (not all valve fanboys are also portal fanboys).

In the end I picked Breen because in the past I’ve seen Valve fanboys beat Nintendo fanboys in the polls.

Read full topic

item.title: Game spots "Greatest Villain" poll
item.dc:creator: Pettifogg
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

Breen was not really a villain, he just worked for the Combine, because he expected Humanity had zero way of resisting the Combine, and knew they would destroy what was not on their side. He saved humanity, man. He saved humanity.

Exactly. A lot of people seem to miss that. I reckon they should have had the Combine as a whole as the villain instead, although I suppose that probably wouldn’t have fit the criteria.

Read full topic
